title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Deleting items in the Coolbar corrupts the layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: When clicking the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the Launch item is incorrectly moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: After clicking the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted and the Launch item should remain on the second row without any changes to its position.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Coolbar. 2. Press the Delete button. 3. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
